import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react' import service from '../..' import { useParams } from 'react-router-dom' export default function StoreProduct() { const idProduct = useParams().carro const [productDetail, setProductDetail] = useState() useEffect(async() => { const service = axios.create({ baseURL: "http://localhost:3001", withCredentials: true, }); const detail = await service.get(`http://localhost:3001/product/detail/${idProduct}`) console.log("este es el detail", detail) setProductDetail(detail.data) }, []) return ( <> { productDetail === undefined?():( //

{productDetail.name}

$66.00

{productDetail.description}

{productDetail.material}

  • {productDetail.size[0]}
  • {productDetail.size[1]}
  • {productDetail.size[2]}
Add cart
) } ) }
